snippet.title: Need for Speed SHIFT Teaser
snippet.description:
Need for Speed SHIFT is the closest you may get to the experience of driving the world's fastest cars!
This is the first look at Need for Speed SHIFT. The game is out now on PC, Xbox 360, PS3 and PSP.
IN STORES NOW: http://shift.needforspeed.com/buynow
